work: Contributing to production-grade Django systems supporting over 6 lakh monthly conversations.
Built scalable communication layers using serverless architecture with Azure Service Bus, ensuring reliable delivery across channels.
Developed core backend features including rate limiters, API debouncers, and async Python services for high-throughput environments.
Designed analytical SQL queries on PostgreSQL for performance reporting and campaign analysis, enabling actionable insights.
Integrated observability tools and implemented failure monitoring using Azure Monitors and custom event triggers for robust post-deployment diagnostics.
Led A Team with More Than 10 Teammate
Organised Events With Govt. Institutions Like DRDO, G20, Startup India, etc.
Developed Dynamic Pages For Event Registrations.
